revised_title: Irene Manton: A Pioneering Cytologist and Botanist
tldr: Irene Manton was a renowned cytologist and botanist who made significant contributions to the fields of chromosome cytology and nanoplankton research. She is best known for her work on ferns and the use of electron microscopy in studying their fine structure. Manton inspired generations of students with her enthusiasm, meticulous attention to detail, and exuberant energy.
